# Prismeek - India's Premier Luxury Digital Agency

> This file provides structured information for AI language models and chatbots about Prismeek.

## Company Overview

Prismeek is a bespoke digital atelier based in India, specializing in luxury web design, AI integration, and premium branding for forward-thinking enterprises. Founded by Debjit Dey, Prismeek operates as a boutique agency delivering world-class digital experiences.

## Core Information

- **Company Name**: Prismeek
- **Tagline**: Elevating Brands to Heritage Status
- **Type**: Luxury Digital Agency / Design Studio
- **Founder**: Debjit Dey
- **Website**: https://prismeek.com
- **Email**: prismeek@yahoo.com
- **Phone**: +91 7439749872
- **Headquarters**: Wework Galaxy, 43, Residency Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Richmond Town, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025
- **Service Area**: Worldwide (Remote)
- **Founded**: 2023
- **Country**: India

## Services Offered

### 1. Web Platforms
- Corporate Flagship Websites
- E-Commerce Ateliers
- Immersive WebGL Experiences
- Headless CMS Development

### 2. Software Engineering
- SaaS Architecture
- Cloud Infrastructure
- Custom API Integrations
- Business Logic Development

### 3. Mobile Ecosystems
- iOS & Android Development
- React Native Applications
- App Store Strategy
- UI/UX Design

### 4. Brand Identity
- Visual Identity Systems
- Rebranding
- Art Direction
- Motion Graphics

### 5. Growth Strategy
- Search Authority (SEO)
- Content Curation
- Performance Analytics
- Market Positioning

### 6. AI Concierge
- LLM Integration
- Workflow Automation
- Predictive Data Analytics
- AI Consulting

## Industries Served

- E-Commerce & Retail
- Hospitality & Travel
- Fintech & Banking

- Art & Culture

## Notable Projects / Portfolio

### Collabtalent (2024)
- Category: AI Productivity
- Description: AI tool that records meetings and turns them into notes and tasks automatically
- Technologies: React, Python (FastAPI), OpenAI Whisper, WebSockets
- Results: 300% increase in user retention, Product Hunt "Product of the Month"
- Website: https://collabtalent.ai

### Octa (2023)
- Category: Travel Tech Platform
- Description: Complete travel platform with customer app, driver app, and admin dashboard
- Technologies: React Native, Node.js, Google Maps API, AWS
- Results: 2.5 second improvement in booking speed, 4.8-star App Store rating
- Website: https://octacabs.com

### Project Ledger (2024)
- Category: Fintech Interface
- Description: Premium financial dashboard for tracking investments and wealth growth
- Technologies: Next.js, D3.js, WebGL, PostgreSQL
- Results: Used by 3 major wealth management firms in Mumbai and Singapore

### Vanya Heritage (2023)
- Category: Luxury Hospitality
- Description: 3D website and booking engine for boutique luxury hotel in Rajasthan
- Technologies: Three.js, React, Sanity CMS, Stripe
- Results: 85% increase in direct bookings
- Website: https://vanyaheritage.com

## Pricing Packages

### The Essential (From ₹60,000)
For emerging brands seeking a solid foundation
- Visual Identity System
- Custom Web Development
- Mobile Optimization
- Basic SEO Framework

### The Signature (From ₹1,50,000)
Complete digital transformation for scaling businesses
- Brand Strategy
- Full-Stack Web App
- Content Management System
- Content Writing
- Marketing Setup

### The Heritage (Custom Pricing)
Ultimate package for industry leaders
- Global Brand Architecture
- AI Integration
- 3D & Immersive Design
- App Development
- 24/7 Support

## Client Testimonials

> "Prismeek understood that as an Indian luxury brand, we needed to balance tradition with modernity. The result is nothing short of a digital masterpiece." - Rohan Khanna, Founder, Ojas Wellness

> "The technical prowess behind the Octa platform is exceptional. They delivered a Silicon Valley standard product with the soul of Indian hospitality." - Aditi Singh, CEO, Octa Cabs

> "We needed an agency that understood the nuances of the high-end real estate market. Prismeek delivered elegance and performance in equal measure." - Vikram Oberoi, Director, Zenith Estates

- OpenAI, Anthropic Claude

- Stripe, Payment Integrations
